entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
